name: dalton
description:
The Dalto nprogram is designed to allow convenient, automated
determination of a largenumber of molecular properties based on an HF,
HF-srDFT, DFT, MP2, CC, CI, MCSCF or MC-srDFT reference wave function.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
Fujitsu SSL2 (Scientific Subroutine Library II) is Math library for
Fujitsu compiler. Fujitsu SSL2 implementation only for Fujitsu compiler.
Fujitsu SSL2 provides the function of blas, lapack and scalapack.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: There can only be one (MPI process)!
